meanings.definition: A person who mixes and serves drinks at a bar.
meanings.sent1: The bartenders were friendly and quick with our orders.
meanings.sent2: The bartenders behind the counter were skilled at making cocktails.
meanings.sent3: The party guests were amazed at the bartenders' speed and accuracy.
meanings.sent4: The bartenders were like magicians, creating delicious concoctions effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bartenders shaking cocktails will stay with me.

meanings.definition: The bartenders at the party were kept busy all night.
meanings.sent1: After the event, the tired bartenders finally got a chance to rest.
meanings.sent2: The bartenders' hard work ensured everyone had a great time at the party.
meanings.sent3: The bartenders' dance moves behind the bar entertained the guests.
meanings.sent4: The bartenders' energy never waned, even as the night grew late.
meanings.sent5: The sound of clinking glasses signaled the bartenders' efficiency.

meanings.definition: We need to hire more bartenders for the new restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The manager decided to recruit additional bartenders to meet demand.
meanings.sent2: The new restaurant's success depended on skilled bartenders.
meanings.sent3: The idea of robot bartenders was briefly considered as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The search for talented bartenders was like finding a needle in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly made drinks lingered around the bartenders.
